chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p p' : prec_list) (m : Map bool) (pl : pl_path), prec_list_kill m p = Some p' -> pl_path_incl pl p' -> pl_path_incl pl p /\ pl_path_true pl m

Premises:
prec_list_kill = fix prec_list_kill (m : Map bool) (p : prec_list) {struct p} : option prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match MapGet bool m a with | Some true => match prec_list_kill m la with | Some la' => match prec_list_kill m ls with | Some ls' => Some (prec_cons a la' ls') | None => Some (prec_cons a la' prec_empty) end | None => match prec_list_kill m ls with | Some ls' => Some ls' | None => None end end | _ => prec_list_kill m ls end | prec_cons a la prec_empty => match MapGet bool m a with | Some true => match prec_list_kill m la with | Some la' => Some (prec_cons a la' prec_empty) | None => None end | _ => None end | prec_empty => Some prec_empty end : Map bool -> prec_list -> option prec
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive pl_path_true : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop := plp_true_nil : forall m : Map bool, pl_path_true pl_path_nil m | plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
pl_kill_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp p -> pl_path_true plp m -> exists pl : prec_list, prec_list_kill m p = Some pl /\ pl_path_incl plp pl
pl_non_empty_path_true : forall (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true
dt_non_empty_r_2 : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists pl : pl_path, pl_path_true pl m /\ pl_path_incl pl p
pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 = fun (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) => forall m : Map bool, pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_true_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop, (forall m : Map bool, P pl_path_nil m) -> (forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> P pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> P (pl_path_cons a pl) m) -> forall (p : pl_path) (m : Map bool), pl_path_true p m -> P p m
dt_non_empty_r_4 : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (pl : pl_path), dt_non_empty_r_def_0 n -> pl_path_true pl (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) -> pl_path_incl pl p -> exists tl : term_list, liste_reconnait d p tl
plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> pl_tl_length pl n
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
st_non_empty_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (s : state) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> pl_non_empty m p = true -> st_non_empty m s = true
states_kill_aux = fix states_kill_aux (m : Map bool) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => match prec_list_kill m p with | Some p' => M1 prec_list a p' | None => M0 prec_list end | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match states_kill_aux m s0 with | @M0 _ => match states_kill_aux m s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list (N.succ_double a) p | @M2 _ m0 m1 => M2 prec_list (M0 prec_list) (M2 prec_list m0 m1) end | @M1 _ a p => let s0' := M1 prec_list a p in match states_kill_aux m s1 with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list (N.double a) p | @M1 _ a0 p0 => M2 prec_list s0' (...
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
dt_non_empty_r_1 : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool), st_non_empty m s = true -> exists (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ pl_non_empty m p = true
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_3 : forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def p p0
pl_path_incl_length_3 : forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> pl_path_incl_length_def p p0
pl_path_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Prop, P pl_path_nil -> (forall (a : ad) (p : pl_path), P p -> P (pl_path_cons a p)) -> forall p : pl_path, P p
MapCard_is_one_unique : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapCard A m = 1 -> forall (a a' : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> MapGet A m a' = Some y' -> a = a' /\ y = y'
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
pl_compat_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_compat_check p = Some n -> pl_tl_length p n
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
MapSweep_semantics_3 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A), MapSweep A f m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f a y = false
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
MapSweep_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapSweep1 A f pf m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = false
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
pl_non_empty_path_true_0 = fun (m : Map bool) (_ : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty) (_ : pl_path_true pl_path_nil m) => eq_refl : pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 pl_path_nil prec_empty
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
